definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: In this way, it might be possible to turn shields—instead of swords—into plowshares .
sentences.chinese: 也許可以把防禦用的盾牌變成鋤頭。

sentences.english: Pressor response was induced by electrical stimulation of the hypothalamic defence area.
sentences.chinese: 電刺激下丘腦“防禦反應區”誘發升壓反應。

sentences.english: Defensibility is also taken into consideration when settling an area.
sentences.chinese: 定居地區還必須考慮到其防禦性。

sentences.english: Captain Aoyagi, the company commander, was killed while he directed the defense.
sentences.chinese: 連隊指揮官，青柳上尉，在直接參加防禦戰時陣亡。

sentences.english: British unit of nonprofessional soldiers organized for defense of GB.
sentences.chinese: 英國爲其防禦而組織的非專業的部隊單位。

sentences.english: Honeypot skill is one of the active defense network security techniques.
sentences.chinese: 蜜罐技術是一種主動防禦的網絡安全技術。

sentences.english: Such missiles could not be resisted by swords or by high walls.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的石彈不能夠用劍甚至高牆來防禦。

sentences.english: What about the fortifications at Verdun and Metz?
sentences.chinese: 那凡爾登與梅斯的防禦工事呢？

sentences.english: Leagues are commonly made for mutual defense.
sentences.chinese: 結成聯盟往往是爲了共同防禦。

sentences.english: And you actually see this in children.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們經常使用這種防禦機制。

sentences.english: From a historic perspective, Jiayuguan and the wall were mainly used for military defense.
sentences.chinese: 從歷史的角度，嘉峪關和城牆主要是用於軍事防禦。

sentences.english: Animals use their claws or talons to catch prey, climb trees, and defend themselves.
sentences.chinese: 動物使用爪子來捕獲獵物，攀爬樹木和自我防禦。

sentences.english: What we're not seeing now is a Strategic Defence Review.
sentences.chinese: 如今，我們不清楚的是戰略防禦演習。

sentences.english: Who for thy self art so unprovident.
sentences.chinese: 去防禦你的衰朽，把自己加強？

sentences.english: Hadrian's Wall is built across Britannia to keep out the barbarians .
sentences.chinese: 橫貫大不列顛的哈德連長城被修築用來防禦野蠻人。

sentences.english: The war planes will be slaughtered, and their missile defense systems, over whelmed.
sentences.chinese: 這些戰機會被屠宰，他們的導彈防禦系統將被覆蓋。

definition: to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
to control/to curb/to restrict/to impede/to pin down (enemy troops)
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
